title: 2 Ways to Sign Out of Hulu on Any TV or Streaming Device

steps.title: Open the Hulu app.
steps.content: Open the Hulu app. You'll find it on your TV's Home screen.

steps.title: Select the account button.
steps.content: Select the account button. It looks like an outline of a person all the way to the right of Home . If you have multiple accounts, make sure you have the correct one picked.

steps.title: Select Log Out.
steps.content: Select Log Out . It's at the bottom of the menu and may prompt you to select "Log out" again to continue. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Clear the app's data cache if you can't log out.
steps.content: Clear the app's data cache if you can't log out. While you shouldn't have any trouble logging out using these steps, you can try clearing the Hulu app cache if you're not able to sign out. Android TV: From the Home screen, go to Settings > Applications > Hulu > and choose Clear Data . Fire Stick and Fire TV: On the Home screen, go to Settings > Applications > Manage Installed Applications > Hulu . Then, choose both Clear Cache and Clear Data . Apple TV: There's no option to clear your app cache, but you can achieve the same effect by uninstalling and reinstalling the Hulu app . Other smart TV models don't offer a way to clear the Hulu app cache. [2] X Research source However, you can try going to your TV's Home screen, opening your profile, and going to Settings > Accounts & Services > Hulu > Log Out .

steps.title: Go to https://secure.hulu.com/account and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://secure.hulu.com/account and log in. If someone is signed in to your Hulu account on another TV, you can log them out remotely using this method. You can also log yourself out of any other devices you forgot to log out from, such as at an Airbnb or hotel. You can stream Hulu on 2 screens at the same time unless you upgrade to Hulu's Unlimited Screens add-on. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click Manage Devices.
steps.content: Click Manage Devices . You'll see this next to your "Add Devices" header.

steps.title: Click Remove next to any TV you want to sign out.
steps.content: Click Remove next to any TV you want to sign out. The next time that TV opens the Hulu app, Hulu will ask for a username and password. [4] X Research source If someone else has been using your account and you don't want them to log back in, remember to change your password .
